answers.answer: This is not the expert doctors forum,this is the community forum but my assessment of your situation is 1.You never had an hiv risk from what you engaged in,2.You never required testing in the first place and finally you can't infect your wife with a virus you don't have yourself.

HIV is unable to reproduce outside its living host (unlike many bacteria or fungi, which may do so under suitable conditions), except under laboratory conditions; therefore, it does not spread or maintain infectiousness outside its host.HIV is transmitted by;Unprotected penetrative anal and/or vaginal sexSharing works with other IV drug usersMother to child

thank u teak for your reply .i was concerned if the vaginal fluid was trapped between the condom and the skin of my penis(im circumcised) would that cause an infection ?and should i go for a 28th day combi test ?sore throat is better but still feeling quite allergic. your reply would of much value to me .thanx
Not sure what else to say, you never had a risk.
Can some one get infected if vaginal fluid or menstrual blood was on fingers. Then after few minutes that person scratches a pimple on his had which produces small amount of blood.is it a risk?
i took another test on 29th day as i am not sure if the condom broke .it came out negative .sore throat is long gone but allergy is still there .still pain in the ear .what could be wrong?

hi rain lover.you guys told me some days back that i was at no risk and did not require testing .but my symptoms were driving me crazy even i developed pain under armpits and chest that comes when i,m extremly anxious  .allergy is still there but not so severe .developed lots of itchy red pimples on my back and tiny red itchless dots .however i was diagnosed with pre diabetes .i took all the test cbc tsh hep b hep c blood sugar .two fourth generation tests at 16th and 29th day negative.put aside the pre diabetes are my symptoms due to anxiety ?please can u guys suggest some thing its driving me crazy now

* Anyone who continues to post excessively, questioning a conclusively negative result or no-risk situation, will be subject to action by MedHelp. Conclusively negative results or a no-risk situation will be based upon the criteria established by MedHelp’s doctors. Action will be taken as follows:* After excessive posting, a warning will be issued by MedHelp* Continuing to post regarding the negative result / no risk situation will result in a 3 day suspension* Continuing to post upon your return will result in a permanent ban.

ok i got the warning, i understand .i want to MOVE ON. please help me move on all u guys teak ,vance ,rainlover ,lizzy, for humanity's sake. suppose if i had a risk and i had tested with duo test at 12 weeks would u guys consider it conclusive? cuz i had a duo test at 12th week(84) days exactly and it was negative,i was really happy but i been to many docs my internal med doc said armpit pain is due to muscular neuropathy caused by diabetes .got my lypmph nodes checked my gp he said no enlarged nodes but was asking for a repeat hiv test at 6 months post exposure .this has made me worried again i cant wait for three more months i already got diabetes if i keep worrying i might end up getting blood pressure or heart disease .this is my final post guys plz dont throw warnings at me i really need your help now i want to MOVE ON plz i want your response.
We are not playing "what if". For people who have a risk 3 month antibody test  is conclusive

Many thanks vance. Finally moving on.there are a lot of forums on net who say condoms are not risk free and people shud test after condom protected sex however they don't clarify those risks  that makes many confused and if they have some symptoms they get paranoid .same happened to me and look what the local docs told me 6 months huh. I'm feeling a lot better and staying safe in  the future .once again thank you for taking your time and commenting. GOD bless u .

question: dear doctori live in pakistan and i had protected sex with a prostitute .we french kissed for a minute or so (i have infected wisdom tooth)and i touched her clit .then with  the same hand i wore the condom, is that a possible risk? after sex i washed my genitals with soap and cleaned my mouth with water .after one week a blister appeared on my upper lip thats when i started to fear that something went wrong . in next couple of days i had a sore throat but no fever and no diarrhoea with slight muscle pain and pain in right ear and slight allergy without rash  .a little bit of headache at evening time.i was starting to freak out now.on the 17 th day i took a test  which was fourth generation hiv1/hiv2 p24 combi test .it came out negative .is that good enough? its day 24and i still have sore throat and allergy .also i have chronic prostatitis since past 7 months and i experince sore throat due to it also .my question is am i safe or should i go for another test ?please do reply as i am in poor state of mind i,m a married person.and i am in fear of spreading the diease to my wife .
title: please help
